comments:
Build: 3.2 RC2

I opened two new workspaces on a single Eclipse configuration simultaneously.  When I closed the Welcome page on one of them, the following NPE appeared in my log file.

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.intro.impl.model.util.BundleUtil.toExternalForm(BundleUtil.java:248)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.intro.impl.model.util.BundleUtil.getResolvedResourceLocation(BundleUtil.java:170)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.intro.impl.model.util.BundleUtil.getResolvedResourceLocation(BundleUtil.java:114)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.intro.impl.html.IntroHTMLGenerator.generateJavascriptElement(IntroHTMLGenerator.java:186)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.intro.impl.html.IntroHTMLGenerator.generateHeadElement(IntroHTMLGenerator.java:148)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.intro.impl.html.IntroHTMLGenerator.generateHTMLElement(IntroHTMLGenerator.java:99)
I wasn't able to reproduce on XP. Other than the stack trace in the log, were there any other noticeable consequences?
I didn't notice any other side-effects.
